items.content_html: OverlapJs is a lightweight and versatile npm package designed to seamlessly blend and overlap two HTML div elements, allowing you to effortlessly integrate images or colors into the overlapping areas.

items.content_html: TS-CLI-Simple Calculator is a (CLI) application built with TypeScript. This project provides basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, all in a convenient command-line tool. It's designed to be lightweight, efficient, and easy to use, making it perfect for quick calculations right from your terminal.
items.title: EimanButt07/TS-CLI-Simple-Calculator: TS-CLI-Simple Calculator is a (CLI) application built with TypeScript. This project provides basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, all in a convenient command-line tool. It's designed to be lightweight, efficient, and easy to use, making it perfect for quick calculations right from your terminal.

items.content_html: Google TasksBoard Lite is a simplified task management application inspired by Google's TasksBoard interface. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this lightweight version focuses on local storage for task persistence, making it beginner-friendly. Enjoy a familiar look and feel while managing your tasks efficiently.
items.title: rahulpaul127/Google-TasksBoard-Clone: Google TasksBoard Lite is a simplified task management application inspired by Google's TasksBoard interface. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this lightweight version focuses on local storage for task persistence, making it beginner-friendly. Enjoy a familiar look and feel while managing your tasks efficiently.
